hero.description: Gaza Sky Geeks is the leading tech hub in Palestine. We weave a network of freelancers, founders, and coders to build a better future.

programs.title: Our Core Programs
programs.subtitle: We provide the skills, mentorship, and network you need to succeed in the digital age.

elevate.name: Elevate
elevate.description: Helping Palestinian tech companies scale and access global markets.

individuals.name: Individuals
individuals.description: Training programs and academies for developers and freelancers.

employability.name: Employability
employability.description: Connecting our talented graduates with meaningful job opportunities.

coworking.name: Co-working spaces
coworking.description: Vibrant hubs with high-speed internet and power for the community.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: We are driving real economic change through technology and innovation. Explore the stories behind the numbers in our annual report.

header.title: About Gaza Sky Geeks
header.subtitle: Whether you are a beginner coder, a freelancer, or a startup founder, we have a path for you.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the resources, mentorship, and network needed for Palestinians to participate in the global digital economy.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A Palestine where any talented individual can build a career or startup that competes globally, regardless of location.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: From a small hub in Gaza to a leading tech enabler in Palestine.

2011.title: Founded
2011.description: Gaza Sky Geeks was established by Mercy Corps and Google.org to support Gaza's digital economy.

2015.title: First Accelerator
2015.description: Launched the first startup accelerator in Gaza, GeeXelerator.

2017.title: Expansion to West Bank
2017.description: Expanded our programs to serve tech talent in the West Bank.

2020.title: Online Pivot
2020.description: Successfully transitioned all programs online during the global pandemic.

present.title: Resilience & Growth
present.description: Continuing to empower thousands of Palestinians despite challenges.

header.title: Our Programs
header.subtitle: Empowering the next generation of Palestinian tech talent.

header.title: Elevate
header.description: The ultimate launchpad for Palestinian tech and digital service companies to scale globally.

content.title: Scale Your Tech Business
content.description: Elevate is a flagship initiative designed to empower Palestinian tech companies to overcome obstacles and access global markets. We provide expert advisory, talent pipelines, and direct connections to international clients.

capacity.title: Capacity Building
capacity.description: Access "Train-to-Hire" stipends to onboard fresh talent and "Upskilling" grants to train your existing team in cutting-edge technologies.

market.title: Market Access
market.description: Get legal support for international contracts, C-Suite coaching, and sponsorship to attend major global tech conferences like GITEX and Web Summit.

marketing.title: Marketing & Branding
marketing.description: Revamp your digital presence with professional agency support, from SEO and content creation to complete brand strategy overhauls.

header.title: Code Academy
header.description: Immersive coding bootcamps to launch your career as a full-stack developer.

content.title: Become a Full Stack Developer
content.description: Our immersive 6-month coding bootcamp is designed to take you from a beginner to a job-ready software engineer. You will learn the latest technologies, work on real-world projects, and get connected with top employers.

header.title: Freelance Academy
header.description: Learn how to work with international clients and earn income online.

content.title: Work from Anywhere
content.description: The Freelance Academy provides training and mentorship to help you build a successful freelancing career. Learn how to find clients, pitch your services, and deliver high-quality work on global platforms.

header.title: Co-working Spaces
header.description: Vibrant, high-tech hubs for innovation and collaboration.

content.title: A Home for Techies
content.description: Our hubs in Gaza and the West Bank provide reliable electricity, high-speed internet, and a supportive community for freelancers, startups, and remote workers. Whether you need a hot desk for a day or a private office for your team, we have flexible membership plans to suit your needs.

header.title: Employability
header.description: Bridging the gap between talent and opportunity.

content.title: Launch Your Career
content.description: Our employability programs are designed to ensure every graduate finds meaningful work. We partner with top companies to provide internships, mentorship, and direct hiring paths.

header.title: GeeXelerator
header.description: Startup acceleration for pre-seed tech startups in Palestine.

content.title: Build Your Startup
content.description: GeeXelerator is the first program of its kind in Gaza. We help early-stage startups validate their ideas, build their products, and get ready for investment through mentorship, funding, and access to a global network.

header.title: For Individuals
header.description: Unlock your potential with our world-class training programs and career accelerators.

header.title: Upskill with Us
header.subtitle: Choose from our wide range of technical and soft skills courses.

filters.no_results: No courses found matching your criteria.

fs-101.title: Full Stack Web Development
fs-101.description: Master React, Node.js, and modern web development practices in this intensive bootcamp.

ui-foundations.title: UI/UX Design Foundations
ui-foundations.description: Learn the principles of user interface and user experience design using Figma.

freelance-kickstart.title: Freelance Kickstart
freelance-kickstart.description: Learn how to build your profile on Upwork and land your first international job.

react-adv.title: Advanced React Patterns
react-adv.description: Deep dive into performance optimization, state management, and custom hooks.

header.title: Contact Us
header.subtitle: Have questions? We would love to hear from you.

info.title: Get in touch
info.description: Our team is here to help you with any inquiries about our programs, courses, or partnerships.

header.title: Our Impact in Photos
header.subtitle: Explore the moments that define our community and our mission.

header.title: Events
header.subtitle: Connect, learn, and grow with our community events.

hackathon-2025.title: Gaza Tech Hackathon
hackathon-2025.description: Join us for a 48-hour coding challenge to solve local problems with tech.

freelance-meetup.title: Freelancers Monthly Meetup
freelance-meetup.description: Network with other freelancers and share tips on landing clients.

react-workshop.title: React Server Components Workshop
react-workshop.description: A deep dive into Next.js App Router and Server Components.

header.title: Get Involved
header.subtitle: There are many ways to contribute to the Gaza Sky Geeks mission.

hire.title: Hire Talent
hire.description: Find top-tier developers, designers, and freelancers from our alumni network.

mentor.title: Become a Mentor
mentor.description: Share your expertise with the next generation of Palestinian tech leaders.

volunteer.title: Volunteer
volunteer.description: Support our events and workshops. Be part of the community.
